akas: The Thorn Bush Bird World-wide (English title) (informal alternative title)
akas from release info: The Thorn Bush Bird World-wide (English title) (informal alternative title)

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Jeong-Eun has been searching for her biological mother who had abandoned her since birth. Jeong-Eun and Young-Jo become close friends because they share the pain of growing up without a mother. Jeong-Eun's friend Yoo-Gyeong, however, is jealous of their relationship. At the age of 25, Jeong-Eun works as a part-time actress while waiting for her mother to find her. On the other hand, Yoo-Gyeong struggles for her debut as a film director and meets producer Young-Jo. Yoo-Gyeong seduces Young-Jo after discovering that he is an heir of a conglomerate and then gets pregnant...

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Jung Eun becomes very involved with the filming process, garnering her both attention and respect, but Yoo Kyung tries to reveal her past.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: When a video clip of Jung Eun as a child pops up on the internet, a huge scandal involving Lee Ae Rin's illegitimate child arises.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Jung Eun's friend, Yang Mi Ryun, and Young Jo's brother, Park Han Soo, get into trouble after swindling investors of 10 million won.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Yoo Kyung runs away from the hospital and forces Jung Eun to put her baby up for adoption under Jung Eun's name.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: With Yoo Kyung back in Korea, old problems surface and threaten Young Jo and Jung Eun's comfortable -- and hidden -- lifestyle.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Despite Kang Woo's desires to cast Jung Eun as the lead for his movie, Yoo Kyung refuses to cast her.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: When Yoo Kyung discovers that the little girl she met at the airport, her maternal instincts kick in.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Jung Eun's secret as a single mother is exposed.

19.title: Episode #1.19
19.plot: Han Byul's dizziness worries Young Jo and Jung Eun. The video clip of Jung Eun seven years ago resurfaces.

imdb.plot outline: Jeong-Eun has been searching for her biological mother who had abandoned her since birth. Jeong-Eun and Young-Jo become close friends because they share the pain of growing up without a mother. Jeong-Eun's friend Yoo-Gyeong, however, is jealous of their relationship. At the age of 25, Jeong-Eun works as a part-time actress while waiting for her mother to find her. On the other hand, Yoo-Gyeong struggles for her debut as a film director and meets producer Young-Jo. Yoo-Gyeong seduces Young-Jo after discovering that he is an heir of a conglomerate and then gets pregnant. But when Young-Jo gives up on the family inheritance, she coldly cuts him off from her life. When Yoo-Gyeong goes into labor and is carried to the hospital due to premature birth, she registers herself as "Jeong-Eun". And when Yoo-Gyeong finally finds her biological mother, who is old, sick, and poor, she abandoned the mother and the baby. Jeong-Eun, who is desperate to have a family, takes Yoo-Gyeong's baby in and visits Yoo-Gyeong's mother Myung-Ja. And by doing so, Yoo-Gyeong changes her fate by pretending to be Myung-Ja's daughter.
imdb.title: The Thorn Birds
plot: Jeong-Eun has been searching for her biological mother who had abandoned her since birth. Jeong-Eun and Young-Jo become close friends because they share the pain of growing up without a mother. Jeong-Eun's friend Yoo-Gyeong, however, is jealous of their relationship. At the age of 25, Jeong-Eun works as a part-time actress while waiting for her mother to find her. On the other hand, Yoo-Gyeong struggles for her debut as a film director and meets producer Young-Jo. Yoo-Gyeong seduces Young-Jo after discovering that he is an heir of a conglomerate and then gets pregnant. But when Young-Jo gives up on the family inheritance, she coldly cuts him off from her life. When Yoo-Gyeong goes into labor and is carried to the hospital due to premature birth, she registers herself as "Jeong-Eun". And when Yoo-Gyeong finally finds her biological mother, who is old, sick, and poor, she abandoned the mother and the baby. Jeong-Eun, who is desperate to have a family, takes Yoo-Gyeong's baby in and visits Yoo-Gyeong's mother Myung-Ja. And by doing so, Yoo-Gyeong changes her fate by pretending to be Myung-Ja's daughter.
